summary: This is a mod that aims to make greybeard robes playable (will make available to you at a later time WITHOUT console commands) and giant clubs drop from giants and be usable by the player. I'll probably add more items later!
descriptionHtml:
ok, time to release my first mod!
it is also available on steam workshop for those of who don't use the nexus for whatever reason.
so, this mod allows for greybeard robes to be looted off of dead greybeards' bodies (you must set them to be nonessential in console first!)
and giant clubs to drop from giants.
I have searched the nexus and both of these have already been done, if not better than this.
However, combining the two edits into one mod was my idea, and I didn't go through anybody's code to do ANY of it.

compatibility: works with almost every mod out there that doesn't edit the greybeard robes or the giant clubs. this means it works with unofficial patches, flora overhauls, better vampires, and nude greybeard mods (that will just make this a bit pointless!)

dlc: none REQUIRED, but I recommend buying them if you don't have them already.

skyrim version: I believe everybody should be on 1.9.32.08. if not, please update and then run the game with this installedÂ  before posting bug reports. I can't help you if you don't use the latest version.

languages: well, this SHOULD work with whatever language, so long as my renaming of an item to "fork" and another to "knife" doesn't bother you too much (optional file only). I'll make translations if you MUST have this mod.

if you don't know how to make a greybeard unessential and then kill him, here's an easy way
1.) type in the console: help wulfgar 4
2.) find the id for the npc it has and type in console: player.placeatme <wulfgar>
don't ACTUALLY type in <wulfgar>, but rather look for the id that's in there and type that in, instead.
then, type this in console: setessential <wulfgar> 0
again, that's where wulfgar's id was, not wulfgar himself.
then, click the wulfgar you spawned and type: kill
if you did it correctly, wulfgar should be dead and you can loot his body. the robes will be in there, too.
if you want the head bandage (i made that playable, too!) then just do this to the other 3 greybeards and see which one(s) have them.

new! clutter thingie optional mod:
I ended up adding a new feature to this! as an optional file, you get the main mod with forks and knives that normally can't be used as usable forks and knives! so please only install one of the mods from the list.
author: C3
